page.title: 16SNOOKER CLUB
page.content: There is a new snooker club which has been built under the Shopping Forum.In 1985 it cost Â£28 for annual membership and only Â£10 for the unemployed. This sport is currently very popular and the club has 600 members. There are 15 tables and 1 private table which are all well maintained.Beside each table is a telephone connection to the bar from which waitress service is provided.The price is calculated by computer and a table costs Â£2 per hour approx. A member can introduce up to 3 guests ,all of whom have to be over 16 yrs. People who do not wish to play snooker can have a drink at the well stocked bar. It is a very popular place and is attractive to locals and visitors alike.
